text:
@StateDept @SecPompeo Can you please explain how and when the US got the genetic code of #COVID19? China just shared the info on that day, if you got it from 🇨🇳 you should not talk about a 🇨🇳 cover-up. Otherwise, are you telling the world the virus actually started from the US?
